articles.description: Google and Apple are working with public health organizations on contact-tracing apps, and this week, they provided details on how that will work. Here's what to expect.
articles.content:
(Image: Shutterstock)
We all want to stop the spread of the coronavirus and end the
pandemic crisis. Contact-tracing is one way to do this, and Google and Apple are working on a cross-platform contact-tracing system for iPhones and Android

articles.description: Dead or alive, you're coming with me--RoboCop make his debut in the reveal trailer for Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath.
articles.content: Ever since 2011's Mortal Kombat, NetherRealm Studios have made a tradition of including guest characters in the roster for both MK and the Injustice franchises. Tossing in the likes of Kratos and Freddy Krueger in brutal MK universe, the developers has kept u… [+2869 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Marino
articles.title: Sonos CEO discusses the Arc and customer backlash over leaving old products behind - The Verge
articles.description: Verge editor-in-chief Nilay Patel welcomes back Sonos CEO Patrick Spence to discuss the products they announced this week, including a Dolby Atmos soundbar.
articles.content: This week we saw Sonos announce several new products, most significantly the Arc, which is the companys first soundbar to support Dolby Atmos. Other new devices include the Sonos Five speaker and a refreshed Sub, and all three will only work with Sonos new S2… [+8722 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Rubino
articles.title: Surface Book 3 will never be the most powerful laptop you've ever seen — here's why - Windows Central
articles.description: Some people wish the Surface Book 3 were an even more powerful laptop and wonder why Microsoft just doesn't use more powerful hardware. The answer comes down to design, and what you want the Surface Book to be, is not at all what it is.
articles.content: Microsoft recently revealed the new Surface Book 3, the first refresh since late 2017. The powerful 2-in-1 gets the latest Intel and NVIDIA silicon making it a more modern device with a reported 50 percent boost in performance. While the lack of design change… [+5461 chars]

articles.title: AirPods Pro vs. Jabra Elite 75t: Which wireless earbuds are worth the cash? - CNET
articles.description: Both are excellent true wireless earbuds. Which ones should you spend your cash on?
articles.content: There's no question that the AirPods Pro are excellent wireless earbuds, with effective noise canceling and tight integration with iOS. But there are other options out there that cost less than the AirPods' $250 (£249 or AU$399) asking price, such as the Gala… [+5767 chars]
